content:
The fall of rocket fragments injured a 15-year-old child who was hospitalized.

About thisreported March 29Defense forces of South of Ukraine.

According to them, the enemy from the Black Sea was directed by the enemy on Odessa 2 managed aviation missiles. Both targets were shot down by air defense.

In some areas of the city, the fall of debris has been recorded. The effects of the attack are clarified.

The forces of southern Ukraine are urged to be careful in case of dangerous objects and warn against attempting to move them on their own. In this case, it is necessary to call operational services.

Asreported the armyinform, during the day Russia fired at 17 regions of Ukraine.
title: Air defense knocked down two missiles flying to Odessa
description: This was reported on March 29 by the forces of the South of Ukraine. According to their data, the enemy with ...
author: Army Inform
